data.title: Synthesis and Optical Properties of Erbium-Doped Sodium Silicate in Sol-Gel Matrix
data.meta_description: In this study, we investigated how the concentration of erbium (0.0, 1, 2 mol% Er) affects the structural and optical properties of thin films mad
